body:
Comment 5 by **kq1quick**: 
Thanks, eadfrith.   I'd missed that discussion and added my displeasure with this 
change there, but I can see I'm a few days late.  It's more than just braces, it's 
whitespace in general (for example, did you know we lost the ability to have 
adjacent string literals concatenated?  m := "This is a " "long message" now no 
longer works as well; it was very handy, especially if the strings were truly very 
long).

I do think this change was a bad idea which adds a lot of unnecessary awkwardness 
and non-orthogonality to the language (which I've thoroughly enjoyed up to this 
point).  I'm disappointed it's WontFix at this point and would hope to see this 
issue revisited in the future.
